title: #94 Caspar Craven on One Simple Change That Will Change Your Entire Life
description: Entrepreneur Caspar Craven learned what proper teamwork can accomplish when he, his wife and 3 young children sailed around the world to recalibrate their struggling lives and marriage. All aspects of the trip taught him the tools to effectively lead a group and your life in the right direction. The author of How the Magic Happens shares what it takes to change the narrative of your story on this episode of Impact Theory with Tom Bilyeu.   SHOW NOTES: Caspar speaks on the power of living with intention. [2:44] Caspar on practicing deep listening to effectively communicate with his wife. [7:33] Caspar and Tom discuss using relentless action to breakthrough doubt and find solutions. [13:30] Caspar touches on building a value-driven organization. [18:15] Caspar lists the cornerstones of effective leadership. [25:13] Caspar explains how to leverage your ego for success. [29:02] Caspar defines break-through thinking and how to build it into your life. [32:20] Caspar reveals the impact he wants to have on the world. [39:22]   QUOTES:  “So when people told us all the reasons that we couldn't do it, sometimes those reasons come across so powerfully they sound like facts. But they're just opinions. And it's really important to remember that distinction. That they are only opinions.” [10:42] “And the only thing that matters is your reaction to whatever comes up. Because you know in life, in business, stuff's going to come up at some point. You just don't know what it is. And it's all about your reaction, how you deal with that....” [20:05] “I always think that the things that will make you thrive in business, are exactly the same things that will make you thrive in a family.” [25:15] “I've got friends who have got boats who were going to go sailing around the world at the same time as we were. They're still in England, they haven't left because they are waiting for perfect. It doesn't exist. Figure out what are the really big things, get on the way, and then trust yourself, you'll be able to figure out those things as you go along.” [26:46] “The thing that I've learnt, whenever I get to a point where I don't know the answer, I feel the frustration building up in me, map coming down off the wall, that sort of stuff. I now know that's a trigger, I've got to go and learn something.” [31:46]   FOLLOW CASPAR CRAVEN: WEBSITE - https://bit.ly/2NqKE4d TWITTER - https://bit.ly/2zXpRBS LINKEDIN - https://bit.ly/2OF2HZn VIMEO - https://bit.ly/2OFWjB2 INSTAGRAM - https://bit.ly/2QyndIk FACEBOOK - https://bit.ly/2NtXj6y BOOKS MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE: Where the Magic Happens - https://amzn.to/2y7JlCJ [2:16] Psycho Cybernetics - https://amzn.to/2yjfuJA [9:33] PEOPLE MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE: Dan Kennedy - https://bit.ly/2PgBf16 [15:17]
